about_the_game:
The Art of Astria Ascending DLC contains:
- A digital map of Orcanon with the main locations you will visit during your journey in Astria Ascending.
- A digital artbook of over 70 pages, gathering concept arts, promotional arts and 2D models of the gorgeous art of Astria Ascending.

The artbook goes through the design of Astria Ascending characters, world, and enemies you will encounter.
